1.name: Level One
1.ability: Re-roll one dice before applying boons

2.name: Level Two
2.ability: Add an extra dice to the initial roll

3.name: Level Three
3.ability: Nudge one dice by increasing or decreasing its value by 1 before applying boons

attack.name: Attack
attack.description: Used to land attacks made with the attack action

force.name: Force
force.description: Used to lift, push, or destroy inanimate things

endurance.name: Endurance
endurance.description: Used to resist disease, poisons and weather

intimidation.name: Intimidation
intimidation.description: Used to scare targets. The target can use Power or Composure for defence

athletics.name: Athletics
athletics.description: Used for climbing, swimming, jumping and similar things

defence.name: Defence
defence.description: Used to avoid threats outside of combat. Increases defence in combat

initiative.name: Initiative
initiative.description: Used to determine initiative order in combat

preparation.name: Preparation
preparation.description: Used to successfully prepare with the preparation action

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.description: Used to conceal one's presence from others

swindling.name: Swindling
swindling.description: Used to make small actions without being noticed, such as pickpocketing

search.name: Search
search.description: Used to scan an area to make a conscious effort to find or spot something

study.name: Study
study.description: Used to find or recall knowledge on obscure topics

survival.name: Survival
survival.description: Used to find food, build shelters, and locate Henge Tablets

toxicology.name: Toxicology
toxicology.description: Used to refine and manipulate poisons

beastiology.name: Beastiology
beastiology.description: Used to identify or recall behaviours and weaknesses of Beasts

awareness.name: Awareness
awareness.description: Used to passively identify unknown hidden dangers and small details

scrutiny.name: Scrutiny
scrutiny.description: Used to separate truth from lies, and determine a person's intentions

charm.name: Charm
charm.description: Used to befriend a person, and encourage them to show kindness

deception.name: Deception
deception.description: Used to give mistruths to a character without being identified

composure.name: Composure
composure.description: Used to resist attempts of manipulation

searchVsAwareness.search: Character must have some idea of what they are looking for and take an active approach. Must be proactive in taking a Search test
searchVsAwareness.awareness: Can be used at any time to pick up details from surroundings. GM can prompt character to take an Awareness test
